channel.title: Behance Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance

item.title: Steidl - International Photography Program Catalogues
item.description: International Photography biannual photo-book catalogues, featuring artists such as Robert Frank, Philip-Lorca diCorcia, William Eggleston, Lewis Baltz, Henry Wessel, Roni Horn, Ed Ruscha and Jim Dine, as well as the Nobel Prize winning authors Gu?nter Grass and Halldór Laxness. I was editor-in-chief, in charge of the Art Direction, photography and brand imagery of the International Photography Program. Acted as principal liaison between artists, designers, museums, galleries, editors and curators. Developed new concepts, themes and creative/editorial directions, working directly with artists and publisher Gerhard Steidl on new book titles. This project was designed, produced and printed in-house at Steidl Verlag in Gottingën, Germany.
item.content:encoded: International Photography biannual photo-book catalogues, featuring artists such as Robert Frank, Philip-Lorca diCorcia, William Eggleston, Lewis Baltz, Henry Wessel, Roni Horn, Ed Ruscha and Jim Dine, as well as the Nobel Prize winning authors Gu?nter Grass and Halldór Laxness. I was editor-in-chief, in charge of the Art Direction, photography and brand imagery of the International Photography Program. Acted as principal liaison between artists, designers, museums, galleries, editors and curators. Developed new concepts, themes and creative/editorial directions, working directly with artists and publisher Gerhard Steidl on new book titles. This project was designed, produced and printed in-house at Steidl Verlag in Gottingën, Germany.

item.title: LSTK Clarendon FREE FONT DOWNLOAD!
item.description: LSTK Clarendon As promised, another free font - and what a sweeeet one! This is our handlettered badass version of the english slab serif typeface, Clarendon. And because we don't want anyone to be lonely, we release it in two (!!!) styles, BOLD and OUTLINE. Use it, abuse it! Seriously! GO make bold stuff.
item.content:encoded: LSTK Clarendon As promised, another free font - and what a sweeeet one! This is our handlettered badass version of the english slab serif typeface, Clarendon. And because we don't want anyone to be lonely, we release it in two (!!!) styles, BOLD and OUTLINE. Use it, abuse it! Seriously! GO make bold stuff.

item.title: IPG Mediabrands Homepage
item.description: Interface Design for the new IPG Mediabrands Homepage. The homepage cityscape background is changing depending on the users location, showing a city with an IPG office nearby. Also the current time and weather conditions for this city are displayed. (This feature will be available in version 2.0 of the live page)
item.content:encoded: Interface Design for the new IPG Mediabrands Homepage. The homepage cityscape background is changing depending on the users location, showing a city with an IPG office nearby. Also the current time and weather conditions for this city are displayed. (This feature will be available in version 2.0 of the live page)

item.title: Sony Music Timeline
item.description: Sony Music Timeline The Sony Music Timeline celebrates 125 years of musical history covering almost 150 square meters of wall space in Sonys Derry Street headquarters. Using just CNC cut vinyl as the sole medium, 54 columns measuring over 2 meters tall cover feature nearly 1000 of Sony Music's signed artists from 1887 to the present day. Emma Pike, VP Industry Relations, who commissioned the piece said, The brief was to bring the inspiration of our music into the heart of our building and make our office space live and breathe our incredible musical legacy. Alexs beautiful graphics and illustrations do exactly that.
item.content:encoded: Sony Music Timeline The Sony Music Timeline celebrates 125 years of musical history covering almost 150 square meters of wall space in Sonys Derry Street headquarters. Using just CNC cut vinyl as the sole medium, 54 columns measuring over 2 meters tall cover feature nearly 1000 of Sony Music's signed artists from 1887 to the present day. Emma Pike, VP Industry Relations, who commissioned the piece said, The brief was to bring the inspiration of our music into the heart of our building and make our office space live and breathe our incredible musical legacy. Alexs beautiful graphics and illustrations do exactly that.

item.title: Suntec City
item.description: A monumental fountain ringed by restaurants and cafes anchors a new civic space in a downtown Singapore district once lacking in street life.
item.content:encoded: A monumental fountain ringed by restaurants and cafes anchors a new civic space in a downtown Singapore district once lacking in street life.

item.title: Book "De Madrid al Palace"
item.description: De Madrid al Palace es un homenaje al Palace, emblemático hotel de Madrid, que este 2012 cumple 100 años. Ilustado por fernando Vicente, con textos de Fernando Royuela, por sus páginas aparecen diferentes personajes que, con motivo de sus viajes a la capital española, eligieron al Palace para hospedarse. A través de sus páginas podremos descubrir anécdotas curiosas de Mick Jagger, Borges, Michael Jackson, Einstein, entre muchos otros ilustres personajes.
item.content:encoded: De Madrid al Palace es un homenaje al Palace, emblemático hotel de Madrid, que este 2012 cumple 100 años. Ilustado por fernando Vicente, con textos de Fernando Royuela, por sus páginas aparecen diferentes personajes que, con motivo de sus viajes a la capital española, eligieron al Palace para hospedarse. A través de sus páginas podremos descubrir anécdotas curiosas de Mick Jagger, Borges, Michael Jackson, Einstein, entre muchos otros ilustres personajes.

item.title: Ogopogo
item.description: Ogopogo is an exciting start-up that brings the gift experience concept to the Croatian market. Ogopogo allows you to choose from a selection of destinations and activities within a given theme. It consists of a gift box containing a brochure, with details of each activity and a voucher to redeem the selected experience. Bunch developed the Ogopogo brand, including naming, tagline, visual identity, website and the product design which features bold visuals hand crafted with paper cut-out models built by Tena Letica and beautifully photographed by Mladen Šari?. Great attention to detail was applied in production stages, especially in paper choice, to ensure that the tactility of paper models extends to the product.
item.content:encoded: Ogopogo is an exciting start-up that brings the gift experience concept to the Croatian market. Ogopogo allows you to choose from a selection of destinations and activities within a given theme. It consists of a gift box containing a brochure, with details of each activity and a voucher to redeem the selected experience. Bunch developed the Ogopogo brand, including naming, tagline, visual identity, website and the product design which features bold visuals hand crafted with paper cut-out models built by Tena Letica and beautifully photographed by Mladen Šari?. Great attention to detail was applied in production stages, especially in paper choice, to ensure that the tactility of paper models extends to the product.

item.title: Prada Transformer
item.description: Designed by OMA, Prada Transformer was a temporary cultural pavilion situated on the grounds of Seoul's Gyeonghui Palace, housing a fashion exhibition, movie theatre, art exhibition, and special event space. The tetrahedral structure was flipped between each phase, fundamentally changing the configuration of the space. Our branding featured a transforming identity system, all the printed materials for each event (Fashion, Cinema, Art, Student Take-over), and a highly dynamic website. Prada-Transformer.com
item.content:encoded: Designed by OMA, Prada Transformer was a temporary cultural pavilion situated on the grounds of Seoul's Gyeonghui Palace, housing a fashion exhibition, movie theatre, art exhibition, and special event space. The tetrahedral structure was flipped between each phase, fundamentally changing the configuration of the space. Our branding featured a transforming identity system, all the printed materials for each event (Fashion, Cinema, Art, Student Take-over), and a highly dynamic website. Prada-Transformer.com

item.title: MYLÈNE POISSON SOMMELIÈRE
item.description: We had a requirement to create a visual identity for Mylene Poisson, sommelier. Mylene is a studio friend who wanted a custom branding. Since the budget was limited, we applied creative solutions to design each component of the project. Using a wineglass, each item was stamped, making them unique and specific to her field of activity.
item.content:encoded: We had a requirement to create a visual identity for Mylene Poisson, sommelier. Mylene is a studio friend who wanted a custom branding. Since the budget was limited, we applied creative solutions to design each component of the project. Using a wineglass, each item was stamped, making them unique and specific to her field of activity.

item.title: Water Wigs Women
item.description: Water Wigs Women is a dynamic set of images using exploding shaped water balloons lit with a triad of colors, to create incredible splashes on the heads of bald women. The result is interesting and arresting "wigs" of water. Enjoy!
item.content:encoded: Water Wigs Women is a dynamic set of images using exploding shaped water balloons lit with a triad of colors, to create incredible splashes on the heads of bald women. The result is interesting and arresting "wigs" of water. Enjoy!

item.title: Aegon Life configurator
item.description: AEGON and THEY launched a new online platform to learn more about the impact that events and choices in your life have on your pension. Play around with your life timeline. Please bear in mind it is still in bèta. Comic House did animations, calculations by EPG, music by Big Orange and we did design, illustrations and realisation.
item.content:encoded: AEGON and THEY launched a new online platform to learn more about the impact that events and choices in your life have on your pension. Play around with your life timeline. Please bear in mind it is still in bèta. Comic House did animations, calculations by EPG, music by Big Orange and we did design, illustrations and realisation.

item.title: Homínidos
item.description: En la clasificación tradicional, la familia Hominidae estaba compuesta exclusivamente por primates bípedos (géneros Homo, Australopithecus, Paranthropus, etc.). Actualmente, según la taxonomía cladística cuyo uso se está imponiendo en primatología, los Hominidae incluyen además a los grandes simios (gorilas, chimpancés y orangutanes) anteriormente clasificados en la familia de los póngidos. En la mayor parte de los trabajos científicos actuales, los homínidos bípedos son ahora clasificados en la subtribu Hominina.
item.content:encoded: En la clasificación tradicional, la familia Hominidae estaba compuesta exclusivamente por primates bípedos (géneros Homo, Australopithecus, Paranthropus, etc.). Actualmente, según la taxonomía cladística cuyo uso se está imponiendo en primatología, los Hominidae incluyen además a los grandes simios (gorilas, chimpancés y orangutanes) anteriormente clasificados en la familia de los póngidos. En la mayor parte de los trabajos científicos actuales, los homínidos bípedos son ahora clasificados en la subtribu Hominina.

item.title: Letro Font Family
item.description: Letro is a modern slab serif with 2 individual weights. It's the perfect choice for magazines, posters, flyers, applications, corporate projects, and also for use as a Webfont. Letro is a modern geometric slab that takes inspiration from early Swiss sans-serif and slab-serif typefaces. Along with working at very small sizes, Letro also has support for over 25 languages. Both Light and Regular weights compliment each other perfectly. So, whether you are working on corporate identity guidelines, or a flyer for an Ibiza rave, Letro is the perfect type choice to give your work a lasting impression.
item.content:encoded: Letro is a modern slab serif with 2 individual weights. It's the perfect choice for magazines, posters, flyers, applications, corporate projects, and also for use as a Webfont. Letro is a modern geometric slab that takes inspiration from early Swiss sans-serif and slab-serif typefaces. Along with working at very small sizes, Letro also has support for over 25 languages. Both Light and Regular weights compliment each other perfectly. So, whether you are working on corporate identity guidelines, or a flyer for an Ibiza rave, Letro is the perfect type choice to give your work a lasting impression.

item.title: Latence
item.description: Vagabonds post apocalyptique ; tous sur la même terre, mais absolument seuls. Sorte dours polaires sur la même banquise, mais ne se croisant jamais. Un instant fort de perdition ; ils sont transportés dans leur imaginaire, leur peurs, leur lassitude ou leur extase, chaque sentiment teinté malgré leurs efforts dun « à quoi bon » latent.
item.content:encoded: Vagabonds post apocalyptique ; tous sur la même terre, mais absolument seuls. Sorte dours polaires sur la même banquise, mais ne se croisant jamais. Un instant fort de perdition ; ils sont transportés dans leur imaginaire, leur peurs, leur lassitude ou leur extase, chaque sentiment teinté malgré leurs efforts dun « à quoi bon » latent.

item.title: Delta Shelter
item.description: This Tom Kundig-designed 1,000 square-foot weekend cabin, basically a steel box on stilts, can be completely shuttered when the owner is away. Situated near a river in a floodplain, the 20 x 20 square footprint rises three stories and is topped by the living room/kitchen. Large, 10 x 18 steel shutters can be closed simultaneously using a hand crank.
item.content:encoded: This Tom Kundig-designed 1,000 square-foot weekend cabin, basically a steel box on stilts, can be completely shuttered when the owner is away. Situated near a river in a floodplain, the 20 x 20 square footprint rises three stories and is topped by the living room/kitchen. Large, 10 x 18 steel shutters can be closed simultaneously using a hand crank.

item.title: Reading Local
item.description: Reading Local is a network of websites devoted to promoting local literary communities across the country. The site started off as a humble blog covering the Portland literary scene, and with our help, expanded into a completely redesigned, interactive platform.
